text.title: Understand Life
text.head: Understand Life
text.p: So far , I have finished one way to develop life and universe understanding . More are coming . Please comment on anything you think is a good method . Or , put you method into the comments box . Which way ? Who knows ? Do you even understand the questions you are asking about questions ? But is the question really about questions ? Dig deep , always deep . Unless , it 's digging you in deep . Understand the universe and all it 's life , let it understand you .
text.head: Steps
Yoga

list.item: I also at a point thought that yoga was pointless . Then , I realized how much it it helped me and gave me a way to stay peaceful and calm the rest of the day . However if this does n't work for you , then there are other ways . However , I encourage trying it at least once .

Find a wide and spacious area where you can set up . This is a very important step , because small areas can do the opposite of give you meaning , and instead just make you feel stuck and unimportant . This is not what you want .

Lay down several mats , even if it is just you . Having more room than you need is a good thing , and maybe even essential , depending on the person . Make sure that the mats are both thick , and soft , as if you could dig into the endless meaning of life through it .

Turn on some soothing music . Now , when I say " soothing music " , I mean soothing to you . If rock and roll or heavy metal are your favorite kinds of music , go for it ! It does not have to be slow , or quiet .

Create a motivation . Do not buy therapy cards , or any kind of idea givers . Think of one yourself , otherwise you 'll find that you are convincing yourself that something someone else said is you . That is not always true , and it takes a lot to figure out what exactly is real , and what is just a mindset .

Either do poses , or lie down thinking . Ask yourself questions like , How important to me is my motavation ? What would change in the world without me ? Suppose I put all my effort into improving the world . How would it change ? How much am I capable of ? Do I have any beliefs or religions ? How do they effect how I think or act ? This should lead to more questions , unless you are n't really thinking . Do n't think too hard , or it will tire you and distract you from obvious answers . If this takes you hours , it is OK . Do n't worry about work , or appointments , anything you are late for . It is just you . What is more important ? Full Meaning or Jobs ?
